70  }

128 class Tree_widget_keeper_wrapper : public QWidget {
129  Q_OBJECT
130 public:
131  Tree_widget_keeper_wrapper(QWidget* child) {
132  _child = child;
133  QVBoxLayout* layout1 = new QVBoxLayout(this);
134  layout1->setContentsMargins(0, 0, 0, 0);
135  layout1->addWidget(_child);
136  }
137 
138  ~Tree_widget_keeper_wrapper() {
139  if (_child->parent() == this) {
140  _child->hide();
141  _child->setParent(0);
142  }
143  }
144 
145 private:
146  QWidget* _child;
147 
148 };

154 class TreeWidget : public QTreeWidget, public AbstractService {
155  Q_OBJECT

161  enum ActionCategory {
162  kItemSelected,
163  kNoItemSelected,
164  kMAX_NUM_CATEGORIES
165  };
166 
167  enum InteractionType {
168  kDoubleClick,
169  kLeftClick,
170  kContextClick, // Used to generate context menu
171  kExpanded,
172  kDrag,
173  kDrop,
174  kDeselected,
175  kMAX_INTERACTION_TYPE
176  };
177 
179 
180  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
183  TreeWidget(CoreEngine* engine, const QString& name, QWidget* parent = nullptr, uint32_t numColumns = 1);
184  ~TreeWidget();
185

191 
193  virtual void addItem(QTreeWidgetItem* item);
194 
196  virtual void removeItem(const Object& object);
197  virtual void removeItem(QTreeWidgetItem* item);
198 
200  template<typename T>
201  QTreeWidgetItem* getItem(const T& object) {
202  QTreeWidgetItemIterator it(this);
203  while (*it) {
204  TreeItem<T>* item = static_cast<TreeItem<T>*>(*it);
205  if (dynamic_cast<Identifiable*>(item->object())->getUuid() == dynamic_cast<const Identifiable*>(&object)->getUuid()) {
206  return item;
207  }
208  ++it;
209  }
210 
211  Logger::Throw("Error, no item found that corresponds to the given object");
212 
213  return nullptr;
214  }
215 
217  virtual void resizeColumns();
218 
220  template<typename T, typename ...args>
221  void addAction(const args& ... values, ActionCategory category) {
222  T* tempCommand = new T(args...);
223  QAction* action = new QAction(tempCommand->text(), this);
224  action->setStatusTip(tempCommand->description());
225  connect(action,
226  &QAction::triggered,
227  m_engine->actionManager(),
228  [this] {m_engine->actionManager()->performAction(
229  new T(args...)
230  );
231  });
232  m_actions[category].push_back(action);
233  delete tempCommand;
234  }
235 
237  template<typename T, typename ...args>
238  void addAction(ActionCategory category,
239  QString&& name,
240  QString&& description,
241  T&& onAction) {
242  QAction* action = new QAction(name, this);
243  action->setStatusTip(description);
244  connect(action,
245  &QAction::triggered,
246  this,
247  onAction);
248  m_actions[category].push_back(action);
249  }
250 
253  void setItemWidget(QTreeWidgetItem* item, int column, QWidget* widget) {
254  QTreeWidget::setItemWidget(item, column, new Tree_widget_keeper_wrapper(widget));
255  item->setData(column, Qt::UserRole, m_allWidgets.count());
256  m_allWidgets << widget;
257  }
